coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the IT Help Desk position. With my background in customer service and troubleshooting, I am eager to contribute to your team.

During my time at Walmart Auto Care, I developed strong problem-solving skills while assisting customers with their automotive needs. This role honed my ability to identify issues quickly and provide effective solutions, ensuring a positive customer experience. Additionally, my experience at Andy's Frozen Custard further strengthened my commitment to delivering excellent service, as I consistently addressed customer inquiries and resolved concerns promptly.

I am proficient in troubleshooting and have a keen interest in technology, which drives my desire to support users in navigating IT challenges. I believe my customer-centric approach and technical aptitude make me a strong candidate for this role. 

I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skills to your organization and help enhance the user experience through effective IT support.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how I can contribute to your team.

Sincerely,  
Avetis Suvalian
resumeBullets: Provided exceptional customer service to resolve technical issues for clients.
Troubleshot hardware and software problems to ensure optimal system performance.
Assisted customers in navigating technical inquiries and provided timely solutions.
Collaborated with team members to enhance service delivery and improve customer satisfaction.

coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

During my time at Walmart Auto Care, I developed strong problem-solving skills while assisting customers with their automotive needs. Sincerely,  
Avetis Suvalian

jobDescription: Looking for a junior IT support technician with customer service experience.
coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Junior IT Support Technician position. With my background in customer service and a strong aptitude for troubleshooting, I believe I would be a valuable addition to your team.

During my time at Walmart Auto Care, I developed essential skills in customer interaction and problem resolution, ensuring a positive experience for each client. My role required me to address various technical issues related to automotive services, which honed my ability to diagnose problems and provide effective solutions promptly. Additionally, my experience at Andy's Frozen Custard further strengthened my customer service skills, where I learned the importance of clear communication and patience while assisting customers.

I am eager to bring my dedication to excellent service and my troubleshooting skills to your organization. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team and support your clients effectively.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how I can contribute to your team.

Sincerely,  
Avetis Suvalian
resumeBullets: Provided exceptional customer service while assisting clients at Walmart Auto Care.
Troubleshot and resolved customer issues efficiently in a fast-paced environment.
Collaborated with team members to enhance service delivery and customer satisfaction.
Maintained a positive attitude while managing multiple customer inquiries and requests.
